publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2864 Mr Brian Monteith: Oor Wullie's 66 years in The Sunday Postâ€”That the Parliament applauds The Sunday Post for continuing to cover the adventures of Scots comic strip hero Oor Wullie, 3,400 episodes and 66 years after he first appeared in the newspaper on 8 March 1936; thanks Dudley D Watkins for his inspiration and creativity in introducing Oor Wullie and other notable characters to our lives, and congratulates Oor Wullie on his birthday on becoming 66 years young and for his entertaining contribution to Scots culture and steadfast work in preserving Scots language for young and old alike.
S1M-2864 Oor Wullie's 66 years in The Sunday Post (lodged on 8 March 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2864 Oor Wullie's 66 years in The Sunday Post (lodged on 8 March 2002) Murdo Fraser*
